item.title: Drupal User Blocked in D7
item.description: How to reset user after being blocked (d7 only)? MySQL> delete from flood where identifier=<uid>; To get the uid, search as follows: MySQL> select uid, name from users where name like '%NameHere%'\G; Details in https://www.drupal.org/node/1023440
